Halal version of CHIPOTLE. They have tacos, burritos, bowls, salads, nachos etc.  prices are the same as chipotle. I paid $28 for a chicken bowl, 2 tacos & 2 Jarritos.  Place is open from 10 am to 2am every day which is great.  Good halal option in the Bronx.

Taco express was a very pleasant experience. The brothers in the front are very friendly, and it was a pleasure to meet them. The food (quality and quality) were equally as good. One of the brothers recommended I try to loaded fries, and he was absolutely right. I will definitely be going back, InshaAllah

I ordered the kids size version and the food was very filling. Hard shell taco is my choice with ground beef with spicy salsa, yellow and white cheese, lettuce and red onions.
With sour cream and spicy queso on the side.

The kids size Quesadilla is four pieces my choice is sweet and spicy shrimp with cheese.

The place is Muslims Owned and there know Mexican food is very delicious and filling.

Check my pictures and short video
Amazing food, even better customer service the manager Hassan and his staff are absolutely amazing. You def get you bang for your buck when it comes to food they are very generous
All the workers were very polite and helpful. They were eager with suggestions and just overall great team. The atmosphere is great, the place is clean. Definitely recommend.

This place is amazing ! Has amazing staff, food and environment! The worker Gandhi is so kind to help me chose what meal I wanted and the manager assan is super friendly and funny. Good job taco express! üòãüòä

The workers very friendly
Place is clean
Get your moneys worth
The food was amazing!!!!!!!!!!
The guy worker suggested I get 2 soft tacos and 1 hard taco instead of 3 soft tacos and when I tell you he know what he talking about the hard taco was soooo good. This is better than chipotle.
I ordered the birria steak tacos and this is what I got. It literally looks like dog food. Extremely dry and disgusting it felt like wet cardboard. Couldn‚Äôt chew or eat it.

The workers are so friendly, and the food is honestly a 10/10. It taste so delicious and comes with a great amount especially for the price. I came here yesterday to try it for the first time and now it‚Äôs my favorite spot to get food from ( plus it‚Äôs halal ).

The honey chipotle chicken is delicious!
This spot has delicious fresh food at an affordable price. I love their burrito bowl ( that is all i have been getting so far). The staff is amazing, friendly and kind. The spot has limited seating but it is clean. Definitely going back to try their quesadillas and tacos.

Is so hard to find a place where you so to eat cheap but you get an extraordinary vibe from the people working there. Thank you so much! Honestly food is not Mexican but is very close to it  looks more Tex-Mex but is ok. I have a great time Thank you all.

If you want something that will fill you up then it's good. However, this is not mexican at all and the flavors aren't. The rice texture is like the microwaveable pouch ones and no flavor. The chicken is extremely soft and chewy. For a grill name, this is not grilled. It's like if you stew chicken breast and then add the sauce on top or they add a lot of meat tenderizer or yogurt during marination. It doesn't taste nor feel grilled. The beans are from the can, people that know how to cook, know what I'm talking about. They're very very soft. The tomato tasted like it was sitting there and the guacamole tasted like if you mix rancid old avocado with new ones. The sauce, fajita vegetables and Lettuce are good. But they need to improve on the rice, beans and chicken which is the main reason why people would stop there. The portions are good size, but ya really need to improve and not rush when making bowls. I notice a lot of teens like to come to this spot, obviously the youth nowadays can't tell quality from something that pretends to be "Mexican grill"

Indulging in the culinary delights of Taco Express was an absolute delight! From the moment we walked in, the ambiance was warm and inviting. Every dish we sampled was a masterpiece, flavorful, and crafted carefully. The menu offers tempting options, showcasing the chef's creativity and expertise. Whether craving classic comfort food or exploring new culinary horizons, Taco Express delivers an unforgettable dining experience. Impeccable service, exquisite flavors, and a charming atmosphere make this restaurant a must-visit for any food lover. Also, They have some fantastic deals on Uber Eats.
I had the hard shell tacos, Most of the staff were friendly, the shrimp & chicken was tasty, the beans could use a little flavoring, overall I had a decent experience visiting this establishment.

I'm the pickiest person and I'm a super food critic. This is definitely the best Tex Mex food going in the borough. Hands down. I ordered two days ago on Uber Eats and I been craving it again so tonight I decided to go in ( they are open late perfect for somebody like me who always has munchies in the middle of the night) it was clean, organized and I was greeted upon walking in. It's not a necessary thing for me. But, I do appreciate you acknowledging I'm here. It's set up like a chipotle, but these ingredients are SO fresh omg. and every topping and condiment they offer plain, they also offer spicy. üò≠ I didn't get a chance to get the name of the guy who was helping me today. But there was two gentlemen. The first guy wasn't very knowledgeable about the food. He may have been new,  not sure. But when I asked the other guy if he could explain to me what the set up was he did. He also recommended the honey chipotle chicken which I didn't get the first time. THAT CHICKEN IS SO GOOD. LIKE I recommend to everyone who goes to get the chicken!!! The only thing I could say is I would've appreciated more guacamole but I just ordered another scoop not sure how they're measuring it. The first bowl was what I received on door dash the second is what I got when I went in tonight. I have no complaints which is rare. Go check them out.

I absolutely love this place. Food is always fresh and the service is amazing. The manager there is so nice!!! This place is 100 times better than chipotle and very affordable. I‚Äôm not the type to leave no review but I just had to. 5 STARS!!! Please give it a try.

Hassan ranjeet hardeep , praj , sweta , ritu , ranjan ajpatel are the best made me feel me so welcome since day 1 everyone should come and support them if you want a great experience and great healthy food.

I got a burrito bowl and some chips with guacamole. The food was honestly pretty great, it had lots of flavor and was super fresh! I was recommended by a friend to eat there and it did not disappoint! Would definitely be eating there from now on, especially since the food there is 10 times more healthy compared to the other restaurants nearby. Overall an easy 10/10 in my books, hoping for all the best ‚ù§Ô∏è!
Amazing service and even better food. If you‚Äôre in the area I definitely suggest dropping off to try it out. 10/10 would come again
Made sure I had everything I need and also even put a little extra chicken

Staff is super friendly and personable! Today, Hassan helped me and he was really bubbly, knew the menu options well and allowed me to try some of the meats so i could make a decision on what i wanted. Really great customer service!

10/10 absolutely delicious the shrimp stood out to me soooo much i didn‚Äôt expect it to be soooooo goood nd the food was perfect wish i could‚Äôve went to the place myself as they left me a cute lil bite for the fact they didn‚Äôt have the juice i wanted üò©üíï

Fast service. Many different affordable options. Food is tasty, hot and prepared according to your liking. Staff is extremely nice, always smiling. Tables clean  I work nearby so it‚Äôs convenient. Also ordered via Uber eats and now my kids are hooked.

This place is a gem the staff is so friendly and welcoming. The food did not disappoint. Everything was so delicious. I recommend getting a bowl with cilantro lime rice, peppers and onions, shrimp and steak. 10/10!!!!

I love this place but I guess only the queens one. I went there today and it was so hot because of construction. They gave me so little protein unlike the one in queens . They charged me extra for protein and still put less amount than usual.
They are so kind and generous with their food. Love the environment

I stepped in because the shop was advertising burrito bowls for 7.99 for students, teachers and healthcare professionals, and left with a satisfied appetite and a smile on my face.

The workers at this location are not only incredibly kind but attentive and cordial, serving up hot food quickly. The food is incredible, and it's reasonably priced for a filling meal. I'll definitely find myself circling back soon.

‚∏ª

Best Food & Even Better People ‚Äì Taco Express is Top Tier!
I‚Äôve had a lot of food in my life, but nothing hits quite like Taco Express. The flavors are incredible ‚Äî fresh, bold, and consistently delicious. But what truly sets this place apart are the amazing people behind it.

Mahir, Ravi, Yameen, Baharas, Sono, and Akram ‚Äî these guys are the heart and soul of Taco Express. Their passion, dedication, and energy create not just great food, but a whole vibe. They treat every customer like family, and you can feel the love in every bite.

If you‚Äôre looking for unbeatable tacos and a team that goes above and beyond, Taco Express is where it‚Äôs at. Hands down the best food and best crew I‚Äôve ever experienced.
My good friends in service y the best food a like to much
The food here is amazing! The customer service is fairly decent and I always leave with a smile üòå Please eat here because you will not regret it

Went here for the first time and I Def need to try more things on the menu! I got these two tacos and it tasted so good! The women behind the counter were super nice and so helpful with trying to help me to order. Very nice place I recommend !

good food and friendly staff. i go to school around there so it‚Äôs a great hangout place for friends to grab something to eat during lunch or after school. They also have great discount for students it‚Äôs like i think 8 dollar for a bowl. would skimp me sometimes but overall it‚Äôs still way better than chipotle

Absolutely delicious! The food at Taco Express Mexican Grill is always fresh, flavorful, and served fast. The tacos are packed with taste, and the staff is super friendly. A great spot for a quick, satisfying meal. Highly recommend!

All three of the night workers are fantastic and the food is delicious! Please try the honey chicken!!!
I can't wait to go back!

Order uber eats from this place. I guess they don‚Äôt pay attention to the orders that are placed. A lot of the items were missing and poor quality on the food. Never again will I order from here or come to eat at the establishment. A disgrace to charge $6 for 3 mini small churros ü§¶üèº‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏èboy I love Mexican food but this right here is a zero for me and my family
The guys there are hilarious and very kind. The tacos were delicious the first time that I came back the very next night!! Thanks, guys...pregnant girl is happy üòä!!

Food is OK, but can be better! They should work on their steak quality, pickled onions birria broth and quantity! Overall if you don‚Äôt wanna leave the Bronx and travel to queens for halal Mexican food this is it.
VERY welcoming, good food good variety! Real affordable prices
If you like halal Mexican foods, thats the right place. Nice service as well.
Amazing employees and amazing portions. Good was fresh and delicious. 10/10

Staff are very friendly and they used to be verified by HFSSA for Zabiha halal and got them certification removed. However, it doesn‚Äôt necessarily mean it‚Äôs not zabiha anymore. What I recommend to remove the doubts of people wanting to know if the food is zabiha or not is to get an HMS certification, they certify hand slaughter restaurants for free. It would definitely bring more customers and remove the doubts of people who think the food may not be zabiha. One problem is I wish the food was more cheaper, a bit expensive.

The mangers and cashier outstanding service A++ cashier ranjee
Mangers Hassan
Finally there is a halal Mexican spot in the Bronx! The food and service is amazing, Heena was really nice and all the other workers were very friendly as well

The restaurant brings an elevated experience to mexican-american/ tex-mex cuisine. It‚Äôs like Chipotle on steroids, same concept but better, more affordable, & a different twist. The ‚ÄúHoney Chipotle Chicken‚Äù is an absolute must try! They let you customize your dish with a lot of options to enhance your meal.

Between the unique sauces and the different kinds of dressings this place is as fun as it gets! Open until 3AM & the staff is super friendly and accommodating. They also offer buy one get one free on ANY dish online through UberEats.
